Description:
IT Service Desk- Kuwait/ Immediate JoinersA. Accountabilities:Provide support in a technical Help Desk environment.
Provide user training experience or equivalent.
Ability to gather user information, assess and fulfill user needs, educate the user and document communication.
Diagnosing and solving computer related problems (hardware and software).
Ability to work under the pressure of high volumes of user calls and emails.Skills
Skills:
Experience with user serviceability to gather user information, assess and fulfill user needs, educate the user and document communication.
Previous experience with Windows systems support.
Familiarity with Client/Server structure.
Experience in diagnosing and solving computer related problems (hardware and software).
Strong organizational skills and ability to juggle multiple tasks and issues at once.
Strong attention to detail and the ability to work under the pressure of high volumes of user calls and emails.
Hand-on experience in computers and internet.
Hand on ticketing system procedures.
2/- years experience in IT Technical support / Service desk / Helpdesk role.

Diploma in IT / Electronics/ Information Technology.
Candidate must have any of the following certification: Microsoft, IBM, ITIL, or CompTIA.

Effective communication skills (both oral and written) .
Enthusiastic attitude and commitment to delivering unparalleled user services.

Kuwait Based/ Transferable visa.
Immediate Joiner is having a preference.
Male Gender is mandatory.
The budget for the role is KWD 275/- KWD 300/- unnegotiable.
